docs.lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn woman, who is legally blind, returned to a nightmare at her apartment the day after Tropical Storm Irene hit.

headline.seo: Flooded Home Gives Her Another Obstacle to Overcome
headline.main: After Tropical Storm, Flooded Apartment Is Just One More Obstacle to Overcome
headline.print_headline: After Tropical Storm, Flooded Apartment Is Just One More Obstacle to Overcome

docs.abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of seven agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Yugely Nunez buy furniture and clothing.
docs.snippet: A Brooklyn woman, who is legally blind, returned to a nightmare at her apartment the day after Tropical Storm Irene hit.
